title: Beachfront Land in Tangalle - LIP 050
details: LIP-050 Located between Tangalle and Hambantota this attractively priced property is an ideal piece of land for someone looking to build a holiday home or boutique guest house away from the main tourist destinations. The property is located only 20 minutes’ drive from the large town of Tangalle where all amenities are available and also close to a nature reserve, which attracts a wealth of migratory birds, including peacocks and resident water birds. This beach attracts nesting turtles all year round.
